divs: Sighting DetailsTravelling east on I-40 just east of Statesville, NC at 9:50 PM noticed a triangular craft approx 30 feet long on each side hovering above a farm field and easily observable by other traffic on interstate. Slowed and observed the craft was motionless, approx at tree level, with no noticeable turbulence indicating propwash or downdraft. Craft had bright red light at each corner (3) and these lights lit the bottom of the craft. Am absolutely certain not a helicopter or fixed wing aircraft. Other drivers appeared to slow to look at craft.
Summary: Grey Metallic Triangle w Red light at each corner hovering
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Statesville
There were no other sightings in Statesville on or around November 15th 2009
